Description: Shoulder sherd of Milesian Fikellura pottery oinochoe; interior reserved; exterior, white slip; from top,: part of black band; frieze of lotus flowers and buds with added red; band of dots between black lines; cable pattern.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Cook suggests that another sherd in a private collection in Cambridge might belong to the same oinochoe as N 20.
Bibliographic references: CVA Musée Scheurleer II (Hague) / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Pays-Bas Musée Scheurleer (p. 6, no. 6, pl. 3, no. 6)
